ThingDef.label: golden cube tree
ThingDef.description:
These rare trees grow giant, shimmering golden cubes in place of fruit. Their trunks are smooth and warm, radiating a gentle comfort. When the wind rustles their leaves, the cubes chime softly, like distant laughter. Though they offer no practical boon beyond wood and gold, standing beneath one feels inexplicably reassuring.

Plant details: Golden cube trees are wild plants, and they need minimum terrain fertility of 0.7. Can be harvested for wood and gold.

Based on art by Sofia da Silva https://fisilva.artstation.com/projects/bkaDn

ThingDef.label: flesh tree
ThingDef.description:
A grotesque growth of pulsing, veiny tissue stretched over a warped wooden frame. Its "bark" oozes with coagulated sap that smells faintly of blood.

Plant details: Flesh trees are wild plants, and they need minimum terrain fertility of 0.7. Can be harvested for wood and twisted flesh.

Inspired by art by Prajwal K Kumar https://www.artstation.com/prajwalkkumar

ThingDef.label: dessert tree
ThingDef.description: An easy answer to the question: "what would you create if you were an insane plant geneticist?". This whimsical tree with a sugary trunk, frosting-like growths, and fruit that resembles glazed confections lures animals and colonists alike with the promise of edible delights.\n\nPlant details: Dessert trees are wild plants, and they need minimum terrain fertility of 0.7. Can be harvested for wood and fine desserts.

ThingDef.label: techno tree
ThingDef.description:
A bizarre fusion of bark and circuitry, this half-synthetic tree hums with low energy pulses. It grows like a plant, but responds like a machine. Small amounts of circuitry can be extracted from them, making industrial-grade components a renewable resource in this region.

Plant details: Techno trees are wild plants, and they need minimum terrain fertility of 0.7. Can be harvested for wood and components.

Inspired by art by Prajwal K Kumar https://www.artstation.com/prajwalkkumar

ThingDef.label: luminescent tree
ThingDef.description:
A tree-like giant bramble that supports a huge globe of glowing sap that casts a soft, colorful light in the dark. Its branches cradle the orb like a lantern, and the liquid inside gently swirls with bioluminescent energy.

Plant details: Luminescent trees are wild plants, and they need minimum terrain fertility of 0.7. Can be harvested for wood.

Inspired by art by Prajwal K Kumar https://www.artstation.com/prajwalkkumar
